39.name: Jotun Slayer
39.description: These creatures used to be powerful and great kings. Now, dead.

43.name: Ogre Slayer
43.description: Big and tough are only impressive if you're alive to show it off.

50.name: Troll Slayer
50.description: Even trolls can't stand such brutal onslaughts.

53.name: Zhaitan's Bane
53.description: Zhaitan should have raised a better army.

130.name: Hobby Tinkerer
130.description: Changing equipment more often than grawl change gods.

380.name: Fractal Frequenter
380.description: Number of fractals completed in the Fractals of the Mists.

405.name: Daily Top Stats
405.description: There's more than one way to contribute. You find the one that works.
405.requirement: Earn a top scoreboard stat on your team in a PvP match.

416.name: Sylvari Surprise
416.description: Tixx is opening a new branch.
416.requirement: Help out at Tixx's workshop in the Grove.

501.name: Hero Point Accumulator
501.requirement: Acquire hero points from hero challenges or by leveling a character that is already level 80.

506.name: Shiverpeaks Event Completer
506.requirement: Complete events in the following Shiverpeak Mountains maps: Wayfarer Foothills, Snowden Drifts, Lornar's Pass, Dredgehaunt Cliffs, Timberline Falls, and Frostgorge Sound.

764.name: Crystal Obsessed
764.description: In Sanctum Sprint, collect as many crystals as possible.

772.name: Champion of the Crown
772.requirement: Represent Kryta in the Crown Pavilion. Escort human emissaries to hot-air balloons.

773.name: Champion of the Legions
773.requirement: Represent the Black Citadel in the Crown Pavilion. Escort charr emissaries to hot-air balloons.

824.name: Portal Invasion Closer
824.requirement: Respond to five of Scarlet's portal invasions and be there when each one ends.

887.name: Here Be Dragons!
887.requirement: Participate in the Tequatl encounter  times.

893.name: Boss Week: Here Be Dragons!
893.requirement: Participate in the Tequatl encounter, or any other world boss encounter,  times.

902.name: Quick on Your Feet
902.requirement: Defeat Tequatl without getting hit by a vortex attack.

991.name: WvW Premier Season: 1st Place
991.requirement: Win your league in a WvW Season.

1183.name: Toxic Gardener
1183.description: Aid in the destruction of toxic offshoots.

1309.name: Vigil Field Supporter
1309.requirement: Help the Vigil crusaders reach investigation sites on Bloodtide Coast.

1349.name: Boss Thumper XVIII
1349.requirement: Participate in either the fight against the twisted marionette in Lornar's Pass or the fight against the great jungle wurms on Bloodtide Coast.

1373.name: Ledge of the Mists
1373.requirement: Fall off any of the floating islands and plummet into the Mists.

1527.name: Harsh Detox
1527.requirement: Kill members of the Toxic Alliance in Lion's Arch.

1536.name: Breakdown in Command
1536.requirement: Participated in any champion event in Lion's Arch.

1637.name: Sparring Rock Master
1637.requirement: Defeat Nochtli without falling off or leaving the top of her sparring rock.

1677.name: Strike's Over
1677.requirement: Avoid the power-strike attack without leaving the room.

1711.name: Treasure Hunter
1711.description: <c=@flavor>In the end, the greatest treasure was an adventurous spirit. That, or what's in the box.</c>
1711.requirement: Collect all  treasures from locations around Tyria.

1767.name: You, Back in the Box
1767.requirement: Help Tassi reseal the reliquary. Side effects might include stickiness.

1783.name: Echoes of the Past
1783.requirement: Search for information on how to defeat the Mordrem, and uncover a hidden secret.

1801.name: The Executioner
1801.requirement: Slay the Legendary Mordrem Executioner. Appears rarely around Amber Sandfall when controlled by Pact.

1825.name: Luminescent Leggings
1825.requirement: Collect the  parts required to assemble Luminscent Leggings.

1847.name: Daily WvW Caravan Disruptor
1847.description: Cut off the enemy supply chain in the Mists.
1847.requirement: Destroy  enemy supply caravan in World versus World.

1861.name: Daily PvP Player Kills
1861.requirement: Kill, or help kill,  enemy player in a PvP match.

1866.name: Daily Warrior Winner
1866.requirement: Win  PvP match as a Warrior.

1908.name: Daily Coddler's Cove Jumping Puzzle
1908.requirement: Complete the Coddler's Cove jumping puzzle in Timberline Falls.

1910.name: Daily Fawcett's Bounty Jumping Puzzle
1910.requirement: Complete the Fawcett's Bounty jumping puzzle in Harathi Hinterlands.

1938.name: Daily Ascalon Vista Viewer
1938.description: Always on the lookout for a good view.
1938.requirement: View a vista in one of the following Ascalon maps: Plains of Ashford, Diessa Plateau, Fields of Ruin, Blazeridge Steppes, Iron Marches, and Fireheart Rise.

1943.name: Daily Gendarran Fields Event Completer
1943.requirement: Complete events in Gendarran Fields in Kryta.

1963.name: Daily Queensdale Event Completer
1963.requirement: Complete events in Queensdale in Kryta.

1986.name: Daily Scale 11–20 Fractal
1986.requirement: Complete a set of four fractals on a single difficulty level between 11 and 20 inside the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2176.name: An Ignoble End
2176.requirement: Find and question the wounded Mordrem Guard on the outskirts of Rata Novus.

2218.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 9
2218.requirement: Complete  scale 9 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2273.name: Vigil's Honor
2273.requirement: Unlock all  Vigil's Honor weapon and armor skins.
2273.locked_text: Purchase a Vigil Equipment Guide from Vigil weapon and armor merchants at the Vigil Headquarters.

2299.name: SCAR Supporter
2299.description: Great to have you lead the way, Commander!
2299.requirement: Participate in every stage of helping the SCAR team recover from the crash.

bits.text: Reassembled SCAR Team
Reinforced SCAR Bivouac
Tested Resonators
Gathered Scrap for Terrill
Killed Enraged Chak
Protected Cannon
Stopped Mordrem Migration

2359.name: Machined Mace
2359.requirement: Collect all  items to forge your Machined Mace.

bits.text: Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Purchased from Exalted vendors for aurillium.
Purchased from Nuhoch vendors for ley-line crystals.
Charge an oiled weapon component at a place of power in the Heart of Maguuma.
Found in Noxious Pods in Dragon's Stand.

2366.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 23
2366.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2449.name: Meteorlogicus III: Storm
2449.description: Power, regardless of origin, is only of use when it is properly mastered, and to control the elements, one must understand the nature of control itself. Consider the nature of control, those who control, and those who are controlled, in your quest to attain the legendary precursor Storm.

bits.text: Clear out Vexa's Lab in Fireheart Rise.
Spend time in a Peacemaker jail cell in Rata Sum.
Save Zephyrites from Inquest captivity in Dry Top.
Kill the Inquest Head Analyst or Corrupted Slayer in the InGenium Research Facility in Blazeridge Steppes.
Talk to Tillee in Garenhoff about the enslaved elementals in Kessex Hills.
Download Professor Portmatt's research from his lab in Bloodtide Coast.
Take over the Inquest base at Bauxite Alchemicals in Malchor's Leap.
Help the pact gain control of the Temple of Melandru in Cursed Shore.
Rescue the captives before the grawl shaman can sacrifice them to the volcano in the Volcanic Fractal.
Free the Colossus from his captivity in the Cliffside Fractal.
Explore the Forsaken Halls in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
Kill Champion Frainn at the Great Oouo in Timberline Falls.
Defend Ulfred while he manipulates the grawl in Wayfarer Foothills into worshipping the norn.
Locate and defeat Orma of Modus Sceleris in Fireheart Rise or Lornar's Pass.
Disguise yourself as a cow and demonstrate combat techniques to the cattle of Wodron Glens in Diessa Plateau.
Find the test results from the Weapons Test Engineer in the Molten Furnace Fractal.
Rescue the quaggan at Moogooloo in Kessex Hills from krait slavery.
Help the Pact gain control of the Temple of Lyssa in Malchor's Leap.
Free the captured charr cubs from Bria's control at her manor in Iron Marches.
Make your way through the defenses of the Inquest Hexfoundry G-14 in Sparkfly Fen.
Create conflict by framing the Flame Legion for attacking the Separatist camp at the Oldgate Clearing in Diessa Plateau.
Convince the grawl to help kill the Centurion of Atrox Castrum in Fireheart Rise.
Locate and kill the transformed krait witch in Ventry Bay in Caledon Forest.
Help the Pact gain control of the Temple of Dwayna in Malchor's Leap.
Help Keeper Jonez Deadrun regain control of the Temple of Grenth in Cursed Shore.
Aid the Pact in gaining control over the Temple of Balthazar in Straits of Devastation.
Purchase from Wark near Terra Combusta in Blazeridge Steppes after rescuing him from the infatuated harpy matriarch.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Historian of the Armaments ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2453.name: Archeotech Adept
2453.description: You've learned how to repair the archaic technology in Rata Novus.
2453.requirement: Collect all of the parts needed to repair the ancient broken golem in Rata Novus.

2486.name: Revenant: Devastation
2486.requirement: Complete the Devastation revenant specialization to unlock the Mistward Warfists collection.

2600.name: Mordremoth Usurper
2600.requirement: Usurp the Mordrem controllers' positions and use their power to kill Mordrem wolves.

2602.name: No Mask Left Behind
2602.description: Collect the masks of fallen Exalted throughout Auric Basin.
2602.requirement: Locate and collect all of the Exalted masks left behind by vinetooths in Auric Basin.
2602.locked_text: Can you find all the Exalted masks throughout the basin?

bits.text: Northwatch Descent: Deep underground below the outpost.
Bristleback Chasm: Somewhere up high in Vinetooth's Den.
Eastwatch Bluff: Overlooking an Eastwatch pylon where an Exalted sage is pulled from his duties.
Griffonfall: Hidden at the bottom of a secret waterfall.
Chak Hollow: Overlooking a razed Nuhoch village.
Morwood Wilds: Behind the vine wall, but be aware that timing is everything!
Bristleback Chasm: Across the falls, stuck on a tree.
Eastwatch Bluff: Look behind the various waterfalls.
The Falls: Check every southern-side tree branch leading down to the falls.
The Falls: Somewhere behind the expansive wall of water.
Westwatch Patch: Within the upper walls of the golden ooze cavern.
Tarnished Treetop: Look on the southern-canopy tree branches for this mask.
Northwatch Descent: On a southwestern ledge with an amazing view of the outpost.
Maguuma Shallows: On an upper perch near where creatures grow big.
Burnisher Quarry: Within the waters at the top of the waterfall.
Mossheart Walk: Within a small cave opposite wyvern's pylon.
Chak Hollow: Located within a southern alcove with a good view to the entrance of Tangled Depths.
Morwood Wilds: In the sky overlooking one of the blighted saplings.
Balthazar's Rest: On a rock with a clear view of the temple door.
Southwatch Creep: Look behind the northwestern wall that faces the outpost itself.
Southwatch Creep: Look to the east by the top of the Tarir entrance.
Southwatch Creep: Check the top roots when heading east on your way to the crash site.
Tarnished Treetop: Keep an eye out on the lower canopy near fungi royalty.
Lastgear Standing: On the outskirts of the cave entrance.
Arrowhead Vale: Overlooking the northern entrance to Tarir.

2611.name: Daily Revenant or Necromancer Winner
2611.requirement: Win  PvP match as a revenant or necromancer.

2677.name: League Professional—Recruit
2677.description: Completing this achievement advances the meta-achievement Path of the Ascension I: The Thrill of Battle.

2720.name: League Veteran
2720.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension II: Tapestry of Sacrifice.

2757.name: League Guardian—Elite
2757.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Profession—Elite achievement.
2757.requirement: Win 10 ranked matches as a guardian.

2801.name: Burns Blunder
2801.requirement: Stand in the wrong place when the Shatterer Lands.

2814.name: Dragon's Shadow
2814.requirement: Gain  invisibility power-up in the Dragon Ball arena.

2882.name: Mineral Resource Extraction 203
2882.requirement: Dig up three bauble chests in World 2, Zone 3 of Super Adventure Box.

2885.name: Course Work: Super Adventure Festival
2885.requirement: Complete three daily achievements in Super Adventure Box. Completion will earn progress in the Course Load achievement, located in the Super Adventure Box: Nostalgia achievement tab.

2888.name: Course Work: Super Adventure Festival
2888.requirement: Complete three daily achievements in Super Adventure Box. Completion will earn progress in the Course Load achievement, located in the Super Adventure Box: Nostalgia achievement tab.

2904.name: Spectral Weapon Collection
2904.requirement: Unlock all  Spectral weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2931.name: Daily Honor of the Waves
2931.requirement: Complete any path in the Honor of the Waves explorable dungeon.

3030.name: Fiona's Stockpile
3030.description:
<c=@flavor>"Magic belongs to the people, and for the people it will be kept."
—Fiona</c>
3030.requirement: In Snowden Drifts, successfully stop the Inquest from capturing  ley-line coalescences after contributing ley energy to the Priory.

3163.name: Shut the Doors
3163.requirement: Complete  door event in Mad King's Labyrinth.

3218.name: Volatile Evader
3218.requirement: Kill Siax the Unclean without being hit by a hallucination's explosion.

3330.name: Sacrificial Lambs
3330.description: Story Instance: A Meeting of Ministers
3330.requirement: Save all of the hostages in the Upper City.

3343.name: Chum Chucker
3343.requirement: Take chum from buckets in New Loamhurst and hurl it at the White Mantle invaders.

3346.name: Daily Lake Doric Bosses
3346.requirement: Destroy one of the legendary bosses patrolling Doric's Landing.

bits.text: Siegemaster Immelhoof
Justiciar Agatha
Cairn the Queenslayer

3408.name: Excess Energy
3408.description:
Story Instance: Heart of the Volcano

"Leaving stray Elder Dragon energy around probably won't cause any problems...but better safe than sorry."
3408.requirement: Find all the lingering fragments of Primordus and Jormag energy in the Heart of the Volcano instance.

3539.name: Harathi Hinterlands Insight: Hidden Ourobon
3539.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Harathi Hinterlands.

3632.name: Lost Lore of Elon Riverlands
3632.requirement: Collect all pages to complete the book.

bits.text: The Deadhouse
Skimshallow Cove Overlook
Within Augury Rock
Skimmer Ranch
Shallows of Despair
Arid Gladefields
Elon Flow Caverns

3639.name: Stonespite Cleaver
3639.requirement: Collect all of the weapon pieces and then forge them together in the fires of a dwarven furnace.

bits.text: Found in a cold room deep inside Derelict Delve.
Found in a cold room deep inside Derelict Delve.
Found in a cold room deep inside Derelict Delve.
Found in a cold room deep inside Derelict Delve.
Found in a cold room deep inside Derelict Delve.
A forgotten forge inside the Derelict Delve.

3651.name: Adept Soulbeast
3651.requirement: Begin training the ranger's soulbeast elite specialization.

3667.name: Zomi the Accomplished
3667.requirement: Successfully answer all of the riddles posed by the water djinn Zomi the Accomplished.

3689.name: A Family Heirloom
3689.description: Search the Windshear Scarps for Unja's lost necklace and return it to her.

bits.text: Find Unja's lost necklace.
Return Unja's necklace to her.

3722.name: Daily Elon Riverlands Bounty Hunter
3722.requirement: Complete a bounty in the Elon Riverlands.

3862.name: Bleached Bones
3862.requirement: Discover bleached bones throughout Crystal Oasis.

bits.text: Sifuri Sand Sea
The Sinking Ruins
The Sinking Ruins
The Sinking Ruins
Bay of Elon

Elona Reach
Omiramba Sand Sea
Omiramba Sand Sea
Hatari Tablelands
Hatari Tablelands
Mekele Bluffs

3883.name: Junundu-Wurm Certified
3883.requirement: Successfully complete the cadet training course using a junundu wurm in Kaluun Ravine.

3886.name: Master Deadeye
3886.requirement: Completely train the thief's deadeye elite specialization.

3895.name: Tip of the Spear
3895.description: <c=@Flavor>In addition to being a cultured and educated populace, the peoples of Elona are notably adept in ways of combat. </c>
3895.requirement: Recover all  Elonian weapons by completing events, looting chests, and identifying items in renown regions of the Crystal Desert.

bits.text: Earned by opening unidentified gear found in the Crystal Desert.
Earned by opening unidentified gear found in the Crystal Desert.
Earned by opening unidentified gear found in the Crystal Desert.
Earned by opening unidentified gear found in the Crystal Desert.
Earned by opening unidentified gear found in the Crystal Desert.

3910.name: Master Bounty Hunter
3910.description: Songs will be written of your heroic exploits someday.
3910.requirement: Complete Legendary bounties in the Crystal Desert region.

bits.text: Complete the achievement "Crystal Oasis Legendary Bounties."
Complete the achievement "Desert Highlands Legendary Bounties."
Complete the achievement "Elon Riverlands Legendary Bounties."
Complete the achievement "The Desolation Legendary Bounties."
Complete the achievement "Domain of Vabbi Legendary Bounties."

3915.name: Mad King's Clock Tower
3915.description: Jump, jump, jump for your life. Fall, fall, fall and you die!
3915.requirement: Complete the Mad King's Clock Tower or Stopped Clock Tower jumping puzzles.

3951.name: The Main Thrust
3951.requirement: Unlock  Sunspear skins in your wardrobe by crafting or using the Trading Post. Recipes can be purchased from renown vendors in the Crystal Desert after unlocking Elonian weapon skins.

bits.text: Unlock the skin for the Sunspear Warsickle by crafting it with a recipe purchased in the Crystal Desert or through the item Abasi's Envenomed Cleaver.
Unlock the skin for the Sunspear Carver by crafting it with a recipe purchased in the Crystal Desert or through the item Darekh's Quick End.
Unlock the skin for the Sunspear Runestone by crafting it with a recipe purchased in the Crystal Desert or through the item Jahdugar's Syllabus.
Unlock the skin for the Sunspear Greatblade by crafting it with a recipe purchased in the Crystal Desert or through the item the Castellan's Quality.
Unlock the skin for the Sunspear Smasher by crafting it with a recipe purchased in the Crystal Desert or through the item Dume's Gilded Smasher.
Unlock the skin for the Sunspear Recurve by crafting it with a recipe purchased in the Crystal Desert or through the item Kina's Warning Shot.
Unlock the skin for the Sunspear Thrasher by crafting it with a recipe purchased in the Crystal Desert or through the item Sogolon's Purifier.
Unlock the skin for the Sunspear Sidearm by crafting it with a recipe purchased in the Crystal Desert or through the item Shorewatcher's Backup.
Unlock the skin for the Sunspear Matchlock by crafting it with a recipe purchased in the Crystal Desert or through the item Raidmarshal Bayonet.
Unlock the skin for the Sunspear Rod by crafting it with a recipe purchased in the Crystal Desert or through the item Odurra's Magnificence.
Unlock the skin for the Sunspear Wallshield by crafting it with a recipe purchased in the Crystal Desert or through the item Timera's Shield of Good Cheer.
Unlock the skin for the Sunspear Pocketbow by crafting it with a recipe purchased in the Crystal Desert or through the item Kahdash's Riding Bow.
Unlock the skin for the Sunspear Standard by crafting it with a recipe purchased in the Crystal Desert or through the item Suti's Hexbreaker.
Unlock the skin for the Sunspear Cutlass by crafting it with a recipe purchased in the Crystal Desert or through the item Libeh's Truthteller.
Unlock the skin for Sunspear Firelight by crafting it with a recipe purchased in the Crystal Desert or through the item Nagozi's Enchanted Lamp.
Unlock the skin for the Sunspear Horn by crafting it with a recipe purchased in the Crystal Desert or through the item Mothusi's Echoing Voice.

3974.name: Daily Domain of Istan Adventurer
3974.requirement: Complete an adventure within the Domain of Istan.

4029.name: Istan Insight: Colossus of Palawadan
4029.requirement: Discover this Istan Mastery Insight in the Domain of Istan.

4053.name: Dashing Through the Snow
4053.requirement: Complete the race event in Divinity's Reach during Wintersday.

4138.name: Daily Sandswept Isles Renown Heart Completer
4138.requirement: Complete any two of the renown hearts in the Sandswept Isles.

4156.name: (Annual) Flight of the Bumble Pugs
4156.description: The scientific term is "bee dogs"—please ignore the discrepancy.
4156.requirement: Complete the race event or adventure in the Super Adventure Box lobby in under five minutes. This achievement can be completed once a year.

4166.name: Lost Invasion
4166.requirement: Help fight off Awakened attacking Southsun Cove.

4207.name: More Than a Hero
4207.description: Create a banner to serve as a physical symbol of your valor upon the battlefield.
4207.requirement: Craft the Banner of the Commander.

4235.name: Rude Awakening
4235.requirement: Kill Awakened and collect their blood.

4284.name: Four Winds Zephyr
4284.requirement: Complete three of the available daily achievements in the Festival of the Four Winds. Completion will earn progress in the Four Winds Gale achievement, located in the Four Winds Customs achievement tab.

4311.name: Meatless Murderer
4311.requirement: Defeat Strugar and Chomper while denying Chomper any delicious meat.

4406.name: In a Grain of Sand
4406.description: Eventually all greatness crumbles to sand. Some great things start from sand, however.
4406.requirement: Gather samples of corrupted sand from around Elona for Ziya's research.

bits.text: Spoke to Ziya and accepted her request.
Somewhere in Jahai Bluffs
Somewhere in Jahai Bluffs
Somewhere in Jahai Bluffs
Somewhere in Jahai Bluffs
Somewhere in the Desolation
Somewhere in the Desolation
Somewhere in the Desert Highlands
Somewhere in the Elon Riverlands
Somewhere in the Domain of Vabbi
Somewhere in the Domain of Vabbi

4503.name: It's Getting Hot in Here
4503.description: I mean, it is technically a sauna. Might as well get comfortable.

4569.name: The Fugitive
4569.requirement: Defeat Hessper Sasso without being caught in the Branded imprisonment. Must participate from the start of the event; eligibility is lost upon leaving.

4570.name: Chasing Tales: Locus of Power
4570.description: Asaliea was said to have an unyielding energy in battle.
4570.requirement: Use a focus to slay 30 enemies in Thunderhead Peaks

bits.text: Learned the legend of Asaliea the Channeler.
Defeated 30 enemies with a focus.

4575.name: Daily Thunderhead Peaks Tomb Raider
4575.requirement: Collect any three of the five dwarven plates at the Dwarven Catacombs in Thunderhead Peaks.

4632.name: Is This a Scratching Post?
4632.requirement: Use the Pale Tree as a scratching post.

bits.text: Find your skyscale at the Displaced Tower jumping puzzle in Jahai Bluffs.
Find your skyscale at the top of Loyalist Warren in the Domain of Kourna.
Find your skyscale in the Eastern Complex in the Sandswept Isles.
Find your skyscale in the Buried Archives jumping puzzle in Cursed Shore.
Find your skyscale in the Spelunker's Delve jumping puzzle in Caledon Forest.
Find your skyscale in the Goemm's Lab jumping puzzle in Metrica Province.
Rescue your skyscale from the shadow behemoth in Queensdale.
Find your skyscale in the Fawcett's Bounty jumping puzzle in Harathi Hinterlands.
Find your skyscale in the Shattered Ice Ruins jumping puzzle in Frostgorge Sound.
Find your skyscale in Rebel's Seclusion in Fireheart Rise.
Find your skyscale in the Griffonrook Run jumping puzzle in Lornar's Pass.
Find your skyscale in the Coddler's Cove jumping puzzle in Timberline Falls.
Rescue your skyscale from the Inquest Golem Mark II in Mount Maelstrom.
Find your skyscale near the Highjump Ranch in Desert Highlands.
Find your skyscale high in the sky above the Desert Highlands.
Find your skyscale above Maculate Fringe in Crystal Oasis.
Find your skyscale near Glint's Legacy in Crystal Oasis.
Find your skyscale in the Sanctum of Nabkha in Crystal Oasis.
Find your skyscale in the Hall of Ascension in Elon Riverlands.
Find your skyscale in Skimshallow Cove in Elon Riverlands.
Rescue your skyscale from the Branded Ley-Line Anomaly in the Domain of Vabbi.

4697.name: Show Some Restraint
4697.requirement: While mounted, use / Soul Binders on Dragonfall.

4736.name: Skyscale of Fear
4736.requirement: Infuse your skyscale egg with fear.

bits.text: Speak with Orson at Demon's Maw in Lornar's Pass.
Get hit by a Brandstorm.
Teach the class at Vehtendi Academy in the Domain of Vabbi.
Get attacked by angry chickens at Ebonhawke in Fields of Ruin.
Get to the very top of the wall in Blazeridge Steppes.

4747.name: Heart to Heart
4747.requirement: Confront Kralkatorrik once and for all.

4777.name: King of the Arena
4777.requirement: Finish the season in 3rd place on the skill rating leaderboard.

4824.name: Aim for the Sky
4824.requirement: Set off firework launchers or personal fireworks in Hoelbrak.

4912.name: Straight-Up Fight
4912.requirement: Blow your cover during your clandestine mission in Chapter 4 and rescue the old fashioned way—with your fists!

4916.name: Master Sous-Chef
4916.description: How would you grill water, anyway?
4916.requirement: Successfully prepare ingredients for the chef in the Blood Keep.

4961.name: Billowing Bellows
4961.requirement: Pump the bellows 15 times in a row without error.

5003.name: Mad Armory: Last Rites
5003.description: An offhanded whim of Mad King Thorn, made a reality by his zealous court. Executioner's tool and tombstone in one, this sword was intended for use on the king's rivals. Then as a loyal adherent of the king, are you not are an appropriate wielder?
5003.requirement: Show your allegiance to the Lunatic Court by performing various feats while in a ghostly form from eating certain Halloween foods.

bits.text: Eat this seasonal treat to receive a temporary ghostly aura.
While under the ghostly aura of certain Halloween foods, loot the final chest of Sharkmaw Caverns in Lion's Arch.
While under the ghostly aura of certain Halloween foods, collect the final reward of an explorable path in Ascalon Catacombs.
While under the ghostly aura of certain Halloween foods, loot the final chest of the Urban Battleground fractal.
While under the ghostly aura of certain Halloween foods, vanquish the Shadow Behemoth and loot its chest.

5052.name: Essence Manipulation 101
5052.requirement: Complete Researcher Yarixx's tutorial on essence manipulation.

5100.name: Kodan Dodger
5100.requirement: Defeat the Kodan in the Sanctum Arena without being downed or defeated.

5177.name: Preparing the Eye
5177.requirement: Recruit standard services and crafters to aid you in the Eye of the North.

bits.text: Generic Vendor
Bank Access
Trading Post Access
Specialist Vendors

5218.name: Visions of the Past: Canach's Lair
5218.description: Unlock a key moment from Living World Season 1 Episode 6, "Last Stand at Southsun," which is then accessed from the Scrying Pool in Eye of the North.
5218.requirement: Find a memento of a past battle inside Ember Passage of Southsun Cove.

5251.name: Daily Drizzlewood Coast Minesweeper
5251.requirement: Complete an event to defuse Dominion mines at Lighthouse Point or Vloxen Mines.

5290.name: Special Mission: Cache Collector
5290.requirement: Use cache keys to open enemy supply caches in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5380.name: Behind Enemy Lines
5380.requirement: Complete the story chapter Behind Enemy Lines.

5419.name: Tribune Weapons Collector
5419.requirement: Unlock all  Dominion Tribune Weapon skins in your wardrobe.

bits.text: Defeat a Blood Dominion Tribune
Defeat a Frost Dominion Tribune
Defeat an Ash Dominion Tribune
Defeat an Iron Dominion Tribune
Defeat a Flame Dominion Tribune

5530.name: Deldrimor Dwarves Global Ranks
5530.requirement: Speak with the Deldrimor Dwarves field leader in Eye of the North once the global support goals have been met.

5533.name: Champions Insight: Gendarran Fields
5533.requirement: Discover this Icebrood Saga Mastery Insight in the Gendarran Fields Dragon Response Mission, accessed via asura gate in Eye of the North.

5535.name: Roaring Flames
5535.requirement: Complete the story chapter Roaring Flames.

5552.name: League Conqueror—Conquest Season Twenty-Five
5552.requirement: Win  ranked matches during Conquest Season Twenty-Five.

5568.name: Poultry Protector
5568.requirement: Protect imperiled poultry endangered in disparate Dragon Response Missions.

bits.text: Caledon Forest
Metrica Province
Bloodtide Coast
Fields of Ruin
Snowden Drifts
Gendarran Fields
Lake Doric

5651.name: There's Always a Greater Destroyer
5651.requirement: During the Wildfire story chapter, successfully break the champion destroyer's defiance and stagger it.

5673.name: Choya Champion
5673.requirement: Gain enough levels to attract the attention of the choya sages.

5697.name: Tide Turner: Lake Doric
5697.requirement: During the Dragon Response Mission, aid each recruited faction at least once while a challenge is active.

bits.text: Crystal Bloom
Ebon Vanguard
Exalted
Kodan
Skritt

5714.name: League Participator—2v2 Season Four
5714.requirement: Play  ranked matches during 2v2 Season Four.

5874.name: Revenge of the Ruinbringer
5874.requirement: Participate in bringing down the Frost Legion's powerful Ruinbringer tank.

5884.name: Return to the Sandswept Isles
5884.requirement: Complete  Return to A Bug in the System achievements.

6048.name: Court Duty: Where Lunatics Dare
6048.requirement: Track down the members of the Lunatic Court's expedition force and question them to piece together the true story of their quest.

6167.name: The Keenest Cut
6167.requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the bladesworn's pistol, the Keenest Cut.
6167.locked_text: Begin training the warrior's bladesworn elite specialization.

bits.text: Begin training the warrior's bladesworn elite specialization.
Completely train the warrior's bladesworn elite specialization.
Combine an Oiled Orichalcum Pistol Barrel, 25 Globs of Ectoplasm, Chunks of Jade, and Chunks of Petrified Echovald Resin in the Mystic Forge.
As a warrior, complete the New Kaineng City meta-event.
As a warrior, complete the Echovald Wilds meta-event.
As a warrior, complete the Ministry of Security story instance or strike.
As a bladesworn, complete the End of Dragons storyline or the Battle for the Jade Sea meta-event.
Catch a humphead wrasse in Seitung Province.
Purchased from the crafting research vendor in Dragon's End.
Purchased from the map currency vendor in the Echovald Wilds.
Earned by defeating Jade Brotherhood enemies in Echovald Wilds.
Earn map completion in New Kaineng City as a warrior.
As a warrior, defeat a leviathan in Seitung Province.
Acquired by mining jade nodes as a warrior.

6183.name: Avian Sharpshooter
6183.requirement: Strike 10 targets in a row in the archery contest.

6223.name: Daily Echovald Wilds Spirit Slayer
6223.requirement: Kill 25 Will-o-the-Wisp, Unbound, or Canthan Spirits in the Echovald Wilds. Spirits that don't award XP will not count toward completion.

6308.name: Daily New Kaineng City Taskmaster
6308.description: Always happy to lend a hand.
6308.requirement: Complete a renown heart in New Kaineng City.

6310.name: Harbinger of Zhaitan
6310.requirement: Kill  Unchained Risen in New Kaineng City.

6338.name: Echovald Wilds Insight: Temple of the Dredge
6338.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in the Echovald Wilds.

6492.name: Daily Heart of Maguuma Fisher
6492.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
6492.requirement: Gather raw materials by catching fish in the following locations: Verdant Brink, Auric Basin, Tangled Depths, or Dragon's Stand.

6514.name: Savior of the Supply Chain
6514.description: Event: Help Xunlai Jade prepare their jade shipment.
6514.requirement: Help Quarrymaster Xiu meet all shipping targets in the Xunlai Jade Quarry.

6561.name: Asset Recovery
6561.requirement: In the story instance The Aetherblade Retreat, plunder all of the Aetherblade chests.

bits.text: Chest 1
Chest 2
Chest 3
Chest 4
Chest 5

6570.name: Hard Boiled
6570.requirement: Complete the story chapter Hard Boiled.

6594.name: Swapping Weapons
6594.requirement:
Use the weapon-swap button to switch your active weapon  time.

<c=@reminder>Weapon swap allows you to change between your equipped weapons to access different skills. This mechanic is unlocked at level 10.</c>

6610.name: Defeating Veterans in Mount Maelstrom
6610.requirement: Defeat  veteran enemies in Mount Maelstrom.

6617.name: Completing Jumping Puzzles
6617.requirement:
Complete  jumping puzzle.

<c=@reminder>Jumping puzzles are discoverable environmental challenges that test your exploration and aerial abilities. Search these puzzles out to learn what secrets they hold!</c>

6628.name: Completing Story Chapters I
6628.requirement:
Complete chapter 1 of your story.

<c=@reminder>You can select your active story and view your progress from the Story Journal menu in the Hero panel.</c>

6725.name: Viewing Vistas IV
6725.requirement:
View / vista in Sparkfly Fen, Mount Maelstrom, Iron Marches, Fireheart Rise, or Timberline Falls.

<c=@reminder>Vistas are scenic locations that show the world from a new perspective, and they are marked with a red triangle icon on the map.</c>

6748.name: Fight at the Finish
6748.requirement: Defeat the Knight of Rot before escaping the tower.

6755.name: The Nightmare Unveiled
6755.requirement: Complete the story chapter The Nightmare Unveiled.

6899.name: Full Circle
6899.requirement: Successfully dine with Rama at the Red Duck Teahouse.

6910.name: Gyala Delve Beetle Racer: Silver
6910.requirement: Complete the Gyala Delve Roller Beetle adventure with a silver rating or better.

6960.name: Wizard's Trial Race
6960.description: This wizard arrives as fast as possible.

7064.name: Timberline Falls Incursions
7064.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in Timberline Falls.

7119.name: Eternal Off to See the Wizard's Tower
7119.description: That's the key to success...among other things.
7119.requirement: Successfully complete events during the Unlocking the Wizard's Tower meta-event.

bits.text: Gather Essence of Awe around Droknar's Light
Gather Essence of Aggression, Joy, Anxiety, Judgment, or Despair around Skywatch Archipelago
Protect Lyhr while He Forges a Key to the Wizard's Tower
Purge Lyhr of Kryptis Corruption

7353.name: Wayfinder Guided Home
7353.description: How long has this been here?

7573.name: Vinelord Edgebloom Weapon Collection
7573.requirement: Unlock all  Vinelord Edgebloom weapon skins in your wardrobe.

7614.name: WvW Rush Land Claimer 2
7614.requirement: Claim land for your realm in World versus World.

7631.name: PvP Rush Entrant
7631.requirement: Meet with Zafirah in Lion's Arch to learn about the Player vs. Player Rush event.

7656.name: The Survivors
7656.requirement: Reconnect with your allies and weaken the enemy's forces.

7717.name: Hero's Origin: Wayfarer Foothills
7717.requirement:
Complete events in Wayfarer Foothills in the Shiverpeak Mountains.

<c=@reminder>You can find events while exploring the world. Events are marked by an orange circle on your map when you're nearby.</c>

7729.name: Inner Nayos Rift Hunting
7729.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Inner Nayos.

bits.text: Tier 1 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 2 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 3 Rift Hunt Target

7899.name: Legendary Shadow
7899.requirement: Win  rated arena game as a thief.

7971.name: Swift Assassination
7971.requirement: Defeat the Daggers of Zakiros within the time limit.

7996.name: Skyscale Target Practice in Inner Nayos: Master
7996.description: "With riders like you, Eparch doesn't stand a chance." —Skyscale Master Stenvall
7996.requirement: Finish the Skyscale Target Practice in Inner Nayos adventure with all targets destroyed.

8015.name: Convergence Challenge Mode—Hell Sister: Silver
8015.requirement: Earn silver-rank timing or better in a Convergence with challenge mode active for this legendary creature.

8055.name: Daily Tier 1 Lonely Tower
8055.requirement: Complete Lonely Tower at fractal scale 1 or higher.

8075.name: Tarnished Coast Veteran
8075.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8153.name: Tales of the Lowland Wisps
8153.description: Not all who wander are lost.
8153.requirement: Follow all of the wisps scattered throughout Lowland Shore.

bits.text: Meet with Stalwart Heart at Moon Camp.
Search under the moon near where your journey begins.
Search in the forest near rocky steps.
Found among the bones of fallen prey in the home of a beast.
Hidden near the cove where boats rest.
Search below the lake near the shore that's home to drakes.
Return to Stalwart Heart at Moon Camp.
Meet with Valiant Aria at Loch Lucent.
Found in the bog by small stream where fresh water flows from above.
Search on the cliffs above the fishing village.
Found on the rocks where fish fly.
Hidden in the southern tundra between a rock and a hard place.
Search by the springs where water flows on half rings.
Meet with Stalwart Heart at Bagoo Cave.
Hidden in Harvest Den near the space with an audience.
Talk to the King Wisp in his den.
Return to Stalwart Heart at Valiant Aria's house near Loch Lucent.

8182.name: Harvesting Information
8182.requirement: Listen to the intel Caithe and Malice gathered in Harvest Den.

8201.name: Lowland Shore Incursions
8201.requirement: Repel titan incursions in Lowland Shore.

8286.name: Pet the Wildlife
8286.description: Comfort survivors of a rotling attack.
8286.requirement: Pet the creatures after saving them from a rotling attack.

bits.text: Comfort the recovering pup in the tundra.
Comfort the recovering fawn in the forest.

8307.name: Lowland Shore Insight: Springs Stand
8307.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery Insight in Lowland Shore.

8331.name: Titanplate Armor Collector
8331.description: Now with 100% less desire to consume bloodstones.
8331.requirement:
Unlock  pieces of the Titanplate armor set by crafting them or purchasing them from the Trading Post and binding them to you.
Unlocking one weight's skin unlocks the other weights' skins.

8362.name: Scouting the Vale: Gold
8362.requirement: Earn a gold medal in the Scouting the Vale adventure.

8378.name: Adventurous Spirit: Domain of Istan (Weekly)
8378.requirement: Complete any adventure in the Domain of Istan.

8458.name: (Repeatable) Mount Balrior: Calibration Collector
8458.description: "Woah. I don't know what 'essence' is, but that sure sounds like fun..."
8458.requirement:
Collect  calibrated essence in Mount Balrior Convergences. 
(Gain less progress when collecting essence as a wisp.)

8531.name: Revenge of the Dragons (Weekly)
8531.requirement: Defeat Primordus and Jormag  time in the Dragonstorm encounter.

8535.name: Adventurous Spirit: The Ox's Yoke (Weekly)
8535.requirement: Complete the Ox's Yoke adventure in Northern Drizzlewood Coast.

8551.name: Home Sweet Homestead: Fractals of the Mists
8551.description: This homestead seems to incorporate energy signatures from multiple fractals.
8551.requirement: Complete fractals of any tier in Fractals of the Mists.

8562.name: Hazardous Research: Gold
8562.requirement: Earn a gold medal in the Hazardous Research adventure.

8607.name: Home Sweet Homestead: Elon Riverlands
8607.description: Ah, but in our homestead, the dead hold all the power.
8607.requirement: Complete events in Elon Riverlands. Group events will award more progress.

8638.name: Hollow Shards
8638.requirement: Help Priory Scholar Ciana gather diminished bloodstone shards.

8660.name: Commander's Cozy Café
8660.requirement: Complete  achievements in the Cozy Café cat-egory.

8666.name: Daily New Kaineng City
8666.requirement: Complete  events in New Kaineng City.

8668.name: Roller Beetle Racing Champion
8668.requirement: Complete  achievements from the Roller Beetle Racing event.

8711.name: Shatterstep
8711.requirement: Defeat the whispering shadow without being hit by Cryoflash.

8750.name: Unknown Nightmares: Gift of the Feast
8750.requirement: This collection can be a useful reference for what is needed for each gift to create Orrax Manifested.

bits.text: Sometimes acquired by combining Mystic Coins, Obsidian Shards, Globs of Ectoplasm, and either Philosopher's Stones or Mystic Crystals in the Mystic Forge. Can also be purchased from strike, raid, or fractal vendors.
Refined from 250 Fine Rift Essences, 100 Masterwork Rift Essences, and 50 Rare Rift Essences. Essences can be found by hunting rifts.
Purchase a seed from Deft Lahar in the homestead, and harvest it after letting it grow for 24 hours.
